name: The Tower Of DOOM: Demo
description:
Hunter heard about the Fanstatic Arcade Event, but he misread it and went to a Tower with lots of wackiness inside, yet he still entered cause he didn't even like the Fanstatic arcade Event.

FEATURES:
  • Cutscene
  • Play as a person named hhunter

And not much more.

Plot Twist!

This game is still on development, so feedback whould be good!
